"Sometimes it is the people no one can imagine anything of who do the things no one can imagine."
"Collaborative production is simple: no one person can take credit for what gets created, and the project could not come into being without the participation of many"
"We are the music makers, And we are the dreamers of dreams"
"How wonderful it is that nobody need wait a single moment before starting to improve the world"
"You're only given one little spark of madness. You mustn't lose it"
"If you have knowledge, let others light their candles at it"
"If you get, give. If you learn, teach"
"We have a hunger of the mind which asks for knowledge of all around us, and the more we gain, the more is our desire; the more we see, the more we are capable of seeing"
"Ever tried. Ever failed. No matter. Try again. Fail again. Fail better"
"A hacker to me is someone creative who does wonderful things"
"Don't undertake a project unless it is manifestly important and nearly impossible"
"To achieve great things, two things are needed: a plan and not quite enough time"
"Let the beauty of what you love be what you do"
"A delayed game is eventually good, a bad game is bad forever"
"To be successful, you have to have your heart in your business and your business in your heart"
"A designer is an emerging synthesis of artist, inventor, mechanic, objective economist and evolutionary strategist"
"You just keep pushing. You just keep pushing. I made every mistake that could be made. But I just kept pushing"
"In the beginner’s mind there are many possibilities, in the expert’s mind there are few"
"Let us stand on each other’s shoulders, not each other’s toes"
"The best way to predict the future is to invent it"
"The only way to do great work is to love what you do. If you haven’t found it yet, keep looking. Don’t settle"
"If A equals success, then the formula is A equals X plus Y plus Z. X is work. Y is play. Z is keep your mouth shut"
"Failure is only the opportunity to begin again more intelligently"
"Scientists investigate that which already is; engineers create that which has never been"
"What I cannot create, I do not understand"
